purpose_booking: To confirm, change or cancel your bookings.
purpose_improvement: To analyze customer preferences and improve the quality of our services.
purpose_marketing: To send information about special offers and promotions (only with your consent).
right_correction: Right to rectification of inaccurate data
right_deletion: Right to erasure of your data
right_unsubscribe: Right to opt out of marketing communications
section_1_content: M.Le Diamant Beauty Lounge respects your privacy and is committed to protecting your personal information.
section_4_content: We use modern encryption and security technologies to protect your personal data from unauthorized access.
title: Privacy Policy
